profile:
Who We Are
The goal of Archisystem Inc. is to provide quality professional services with an environmentally friendly design with minimum impact on the natural environment and natural resources. We strive to prepare designs with the most extensive possible details and information so that the clients, contractors, and end-users fully understand the design and construction methodology. 

Archisystem Inc. is a group of professional architects, designers, and planners serving Ontario since 2001, providing a broad range of services including Planning, Architectural Design, Construction Documentation, and Quality Control during construction, & Building Permit Drawings for Industrial, and Commercial & Residential Projects.

We began as a small architectural drafting company to assist architects, engineers, and private clients to prepare site measured drawings, conversion of paper documents into CAD format, and permit application services. Since then we have grown exponentially and have been actively involved in a variety of projects including government, industrial, commercial and residential throughout the province of Ontario. Archisystem Inc. has acquired the architectural practice license and certificate of practice from the Ontario Association of Architects, which allows us to offer superior architectural design services. Due to more than 15 years of extensive experience in projects of various natures, our talented team is capable of handling any type of building design project.
services: Architectural Design, Tender Documents, Construction Management
specialities: Custom Designed Luxury Houses, Commercial Buildings and Hotels

profile:
Engineering firm that specializes in measuring buildings and developing as-built floor plans and BIM for buildings across North America.  For residential properties, PLANiT offers two main product lines:  1) Marketing Plans (for visualization only) with accurate area calculation, and 2) Detail CAD/Revit Plans containing more measurements to support re-design.  

As-Built Marketing Floor Plans:
Our Building Surveyor measures the residence and develops an as-built floor plan while on-site.  The PDF floor plan and room dimension spreadsheet is emailed to the Realtor within 24 hours for loading to MLS or other marketing media.  This type of floor plan provides an accurate calculation of building area to the Tarion Standard, shows an overall floor plan layout for visualization purposes and, accurate major room dimensions (LxW).  This product is not suitable for re-design or detailed space planning since the locations and sizes of windows and doors etc. are not measured (it is for marketing visualization only).

As-Built for Re-Design:
Where a home is to undergo a renovation, additional measurements are required (e.g., accurately measured windows and doors, sill heights, stairs including riser heights, etc.) and, the floor plan is required in CAD format for digital manipulation.  Architects and Designers hire PLANiT to measure homes and develop base as-built floor plans, elevations, cross-sections, site plans and even 3D Revit/BIM models which form the basis of their re-design.  The exact scope of work including CAD format, level of detail to be collected and any other special requirements are arranged in advance of the site visit.


Please note that PLANiT prepares the as-built floor plans as a starting point for other engineers, architects and designers to prepare required building permit documentation.
PLANiT does not provide drafting services to develop new designs and does not provide other structural consulting services including determination of load bearing walls.
